message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a great deal for you, as I know it's worth a good amount to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. How about we try $87.50? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
